posts.name: Greyson Parrelli
posts.cooked:
We‚Äôre releasing the Signal 7.72 beta soon. If you‚Äôre interested in participating, join the beta group here.

Share your feedback on the latest changes:

Nothing crazy, just bug fixes and such :)

Complete list of new commits since 7.71.2:
https://github.com/signalapp/Signal-Android/compare/v7.71.2‚Ä¶main

Thank you for being a beta tester!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.71 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.72.0 (164200)

Builds will no longer be published to Firebase App Distribution

22 new commits since 7.71.2:

Show commits

  • Fix width of dropdown menu items and add preview. [1]

  • Replace categorical window size classes with breakpoint-based checks. [2]

  • Show upload progress for the first backup on the chat list. [3]

  • Move GlideImage into the glide module. [4]

  • Utilize fallback navbar height if the returned value is zero on Android10 and less. [5]

  • Update a bunch of strings to include nonprofit labeling. [6]

  • Bump libsignal to v0.86.14 [7]

  • Add additional oversized message logging. [8]

  • Migrate to new SVR2 enclave. [9]

  • Do not include large P2P group changes. [10]

  • Remove old safety number code. [11]

  • Add key transparency UI. [12]

  • Fix document download UI not updating on first click. [13]

  • Fix alarms being set for pinned messages. [14]

  • Move MediaFolder to core-model. [15]

  • Centralize common icons into SignalIcons. [16]

  • Add send and receive support for group member labels. [17]

  • Use both envelope.type and ciphertextMessageType in the validator. [18]

  • Move clearable text field to core module. [19]

  • Add Mi 9T Pro voice note sample rate special handling. [20]

    Fixes #14452
    Resolves #14523

  • Update translations and other static files. [21]

  • Bump version to 7.72.0 [22]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-Android v7.71.2‚Ä¶v7.72.0

Localization changes

posts.cooked:
You‚Äôre releasing v7.71, which will allow my groups to commandeer my OS‚Äôs alarm widget?

Will this be addressed?

Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.71 release Android Beta Feedback
This is happening for me as well, on Signal prod on GrapheneOS. Someone set an expiring pinned message for a group chat I was in and it created an alarm on my phone. It‚Äôs annoying since I can‚Äôt tap my alarm button on my phone‚Äôs pull-down menu to access the actual clock app, because doing so takes me directly to that Signal group.

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.71 release

posts.name: üëäüá∫üá∏üî•
posts.cooked:
It‚Äôs been fixed in 7.72:

updates-bot:

Fix alarms being set for pinned messages. [14]
Thanks for pointing that out, and to devs for the fix. I just hope this doesn‚Äôt stay long in production with v7.71 then.

posts.name: üëäüá∫üá∏üî•
posts.cooked:
updates-bot:

Add send and receive support for group member labels. [17]

Assuming this might be behind a flag that‚Äôs not flipped yet?

posts.cooked: They might backport the fix to stable.

posts.cooked:
Screenshot_20260128-1736251080√ó2424 230 KB

The back icon in the image viewer is the wrong color

Logs: https://debuglogs.org/android/7.72.0/0d90b5a5344ad69950a85d6261405ce5af049cac4ace554c61cd0d70963723b4

Thanks
Simply no user-facing stuff yet, it seems. iOS actually incorporated FF in their latest beta.

posts.name: Salt
posts.cooked: 2 posts were merged into an existing topic: Group Members Custom Labels

posts.name: AlertSubject
posts.cooked:
The back arrow turns black in dark mode

Open a chat while in dark mode

Back arrow in top left corner is still white

Open an image or click on a sticker

Go back

Back arrow is now black

Also happened to me during image send flow

This sticker message 1769722056244 shows the sticker and the emoji in the conversation list:

Screenshot_20260129-222820404√ó213 12.2 KB

https://debuglogs.org/android/7.72.0/3fe48f8b32cebd64a8f03e96a0a3a439a38ad8031ece78005824b5997f4513c0

Maybe this is related?

Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.71 release Android Beta Feedback
Lately some stickers do not show their associated emojis. The message (1769600840172) showed the (fallback?) emoji in the notification and still shows it in the conservation list. Correct for that sticker is , which I also see when I look at the pack hand long press the sticker. https://debuglogs.org/android/7.71.2/c20c2a081e653ca6421331a190d4d8f44e64bb880cb264d38c93c3127ca502ca

On another note: the sticker pack in question has no associated emojis for the stickers.

https://signal.art/addstickers/#pack_id=e9c39c6e4de7617ed2a0527540f4d5b5&pack_key=7560d13639afe743e798ee7f886357afbd164c0f72ed0c2a2053a8861008d415

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.72.1 (164300)

Builds will no longer be published to Firebase App Distribution

5 new commits since 7.72.0:

  • Fix issue where invalid videos get stuck in the send flow. [1]

  • Limit gallery to most recent 5k items for now. [2]

  • Move theme colors to core-ui. [3]

  • Update translations and other static files. [4]

  • Bump version to 7.72.1 [5]

posts.name: Antony
posts.cooked:
There is a bug when tapping on the input field to type a message that sometimes prevents the keyboard from popping up. Happening on multiple devices, the logs is from one of them. Has been happening since at least 7.70 but didn‚Äôt really know if it was just me or wide spread issue that is unrelated to a specific keyboard.

Workaround that gets the keyboard to show up: simply, back out of the chat and reopen it or tap on the emoji button then attempt to search for an emoji which gets the keyboard to show up then tap on the message input field again.

https://debuglogs.org/android/7.72.1/9bb630a4d13e4d624bd6c1951815c8b15d758b8daa2162f3ac4bfb6f369eb938

updates-bot:

Utilize fallback navbar height if the returned value is zero on Android10 and less. [5]

It seems to be fixed. Thank you!

In chats with adjusted colours, the bubbles don‚Äôt have the usual rounded corners.

Screenshot_20260130-131908~2343√ó115 5.72 KB

https://debuglogs.org/android/7.72.1/25344f31142ca86b87fa246a3f8e82bd726d19d478835a15c2af652f66121232

posts.name: Greyson Parrelli
posts.cooked:
Leibi:

In chats with adjusted colours, the bubbles don‚Äôt have the usual rounded corners.

That‚Äôs really odd, I have the same phone, running the same version, and I have chats with various wallpapers and colors, and I‚Äôm not encountering this

greyson-signal:

That‚Äôs really odd, I have the same phone, running the same version, and I have chats with various wallpapers and colors, and I‚Äôm not encountering this

I did some more investigation:

It was not about the colour, it also happend in other chats.

So I investigated my display size settings.

Here they are:

Screenshot_20260130-161259~21080√ó869 119 KB

I changed them to default and back again. After force closing Signal everything is fine again.

Also can‚Äôt reproduce the abnormality.

In a group when a user pins a message the emoji on it‚Äôs name are of different fonts (system and Apple) between the pinned messages bar and the group top bar.

10001770761024√ó345 21.9 KB

Also this is still happening on 7.72

https://debuglogs.org/android/7.72.1/e6a4a286c5602d9eefb3edca45b5574a445666a5eba3613dea92540fbaea15c1

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.69 release

posts.cooked: Since there was no feedback about the idea to show the all-pinned-messages bottom sheet always on clicking the pinned message bar, another idea could be to add a long click listener to the whole bar which opens the same popup as if clicking the ‚Äúpin‚Äù.
